TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListView/ListViewItemCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListView.ListViewItemCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 控件中的或分配给 的项的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of items in a control or assigned to a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存储显示在控件中或分配给的项。 A stores the items displayed in a control or assigned to a . 在类中定义了另外两个集合, 使您可以确定在控件中选择的项。There are two other collections defined within the class that enable you to determine what items are selected within a control. 类提供用于确定控件中选定的项的属性和方法, 而类可用于确定控件的中的哪些索引选择.The class provides properties and methods for determining what items are selected in a control, while the class enables you to determine what indexes within the of a control are selected. 除了选择集合类之外, 还提供了两个类, 通过这些类可以确定要检查的项 (在 控件的属性设置为`true`时)。In addition to selection collection classes, there are also two classes that enable you to determine what items are checked (when the property of the control is set to `true`) within this collection. 可以通过多种方法向集合中添加项。There are a number of ways to add items to the collection. 方法向集合中添加单个项。The method adds a single item to the collection. 若要将多个项添加到集合中, 请创建一个项的数组, 并将其传递给方法。To add a number of items to the collection, you create an array of items and pass it to the method. 如果要在集合中的特定位置插入项, 可以使用方法。If you want to insert an item at a specific location in the collection, you can use the method. 若要删除项, 可以使用方法或方法 (如果你知道项在集合中的位置)。To remove items, you can use either the method or the method if you know where the item is located in the collection. 方法使你可以从集合中移除所有项, 而不是使用方法一次删除一个项。 The method enables you to remove all items from the collection instead of using the method to remove a single item at a time. 除了用于添加和删除项的方法和属性外, 还提供用于在集合中查找项的方法。In addition to methods and properties for adding and removing items, the also provides methods to find items in the collection. 使用方法可以确定项是否为集合的成员。The method enables you to determine whether an item is a member of the collection. 一旦您知道该项位于集合中, 就可以使用方法来确定项在集合中的位置。Once you know that the item is located in the collection, you can use the method to determine where the item is located in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将项添加到中。The following code example demonstrates how to add items to a . 请注意, 的 `ListView1` 属性的类型为。Note that the property of `ListView1` is of type . 若要运行此示例, 请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为`ListView1`的对象和名为`TextBox1`的的窗体中。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a object named `ListView1` and a named `TextBox1`. 从窗体的构造函数或事件处理程序调用方法。`InitializeListView`Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 用指定的文本创建一个项并将该项添加到集合中。

span.span: Creates an item with the specified text and adds it to the collection.
The that was added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此版本的方法创建一个新的以添加到控件中。You can use this version of the method to create a new to add to a control. 新添加到控件`text`中的文本基于参数。The text of the new added to the control is based on the `text` parameter. 如果要为项指定图像, 请使用接受图像索引作为参数的方法版本。If you want to specify an image for the item, use the version of the method that accepts an image index as a parameter. 如果你有想要添加到集合中的现有, 请使用接受作为参数的方法的版本。If you have an existing that you want to add to the collection, use the version of the method that accepts a as its parameter. 如果将 属性设置为以外的值, 或者如果设置了属性, 则会在添加项后对该列表进行排序。 If the property is set to a value other than or if the property is set, the list is sorted after the item is added. 否则, 项将插入到列表的末尾。Otherwise, the item is inserted at the end of the list. 如果列表未排序, 则可以使用方法将一项插入到中的特定位置。If the list is not sorted, you can use the method to insert an item into the at a specific position. 若要在一个操作中将一组项添加到控件, 请使用方法。To add a set of items to the control in a single operation, use the method. 如果要使用方法向控件添加大量的项, 请使用和方法, 以防止在添加所有项之前进行重新绘制。If you want to use the method to add a large number of items to the control, use the and methods to prevent the from repainting until all items are added. 向添加项时, 首先排序项并添加新项会更有效。When adding items to a , it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此版本的方法将现有添加到集合中。You can use this version of the method to add an existing to the collection. 此版本的方法通常用于重用其他控件中的项, 或者如果是在将其添加到集合之前手动创建的, 则为。This version of the method is typically used to reuse items from other controls or if the was created manually before adding it to the collection. 如果要创建新的而不是使用现有项, 请使用方法的其他版本。If you want to create a new instead of using an existing item, use the other versions of the method. 如果将 属性设置为以外的值, 或者如果设置了属性, 则会在添加项后对该列表进行排序。 If the property is set to a value other than or if the property is set, the list is sorted after the item is added. 否则, 项将插入到列表的末尾。Otherwise, the item is inserted at the end of the list. 如果列表未排序, 则可以使用方法将一项插入到中的特定位置。If the list is not sorted, you can use the method to insert an item into the at a specific position. 若要在一个操作中将一组项添加到控件, 请使用方法。To add a set of items to the control in a single operation, use the method. 如果要使用方法向控件添加大量的项, 请使用和方法, 以防止在添加所有项之前进行重新绘制。If you want to use the method to add a large number of items to the control, use the and methods to prevent the from repainting until all items are added. 向添加项时, 首先排序项并添加新项会更有效。When adding items to a , it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items. 此版本的方法还用于将分配给。This version of the method is also used to assign a to a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此版本的方法创建一个新的以添加到控件中。You can use this version of the method to create a new to add to the control. 新添加到控件`text`中的文本基于参数。The text of the new added to the control is based on the `text` parameter. 还可以通过将分配给和属性`imageIndex`的索引传递给参数, 为项指定一个图像。You can also specify an image for the item by passing the index of the assigned to the and properties to the `imageIndex` parameter. (通常情况下 , 和属性使用相同的索引位置来显示相关图像。)如果您不希望为该项指定图像索引, 请使用仅接受字符串作为参数的方法版本。(Typically, the and properties use the same index positions to display related images.) If you do not want to specify an image index for the item, use the version of the method that accepts only a string as a parameter. 如果你有想要添加到集合中的现有, 请使用接受作为参数的方法的版本。If you have an existing that you want to add to the collection, use the version of the method that accepts a as its parameter. 如果将 属性设置为以外的值, 或者如果设置了属性, 则会在添加项后对该列表进行排序。 If the property is set to a value other than or if the property is set, the list is sorted after the item is added. 否则, 项将插入到列表的末尾。Otherwise, the item is inserted at the end of the list. 如果列表未排序, 则可以使用方法将一项插入到中的特定位置。If the list is not sorted, you can use the method to insert an item into the at a specific position. 若要在一个操作中将一组项添加到控件, 请使用方法。To add a set of items to the control in a single operation, use the method. 如果要使用方法向控件添加大量的项, 请使用和方法, 以防止在添加所有项之前进行重新绘制。If you want to use the method to add a large number of items to the control, use the and methods to prevent the from repainting until all items are added. 向添加项时, 首先排序项并添加新项会更有效。When adding items to a , it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法重用不同控件中的项。You can use this method to reuse items from a different control. 如果要添加单个, 请使用方法。If you want to add a single , use the method. 如果要在集合中的特定位置添加单个 , 还可以使用方法。You can also use the method if you want to add a single at a specific position in the collection. 你还可以使用此方法将多个对象分配给。You can also use this method to assign multiple objects to a . 如果将 属性设置为以外的值, 或者如果设置了属性, 则会在添加项后对该列表进行排序。 If the property is set to a value other than or if the property is set, the list is sorted after the items are added. 否则, 项将插入到列表的末尾。Otherwise, the items are inserted at the end of the list. 如果列表未排序, 则可以使用方法将项插入到中的特定位置。If the list is not sorted, you can use the method to insert items into the at specific positions. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个控件, 其中指定了三个对象, 并为每个项指定了三个对象。The following example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 该示例还创建了用于在详细信息视图中显示子项的对象。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 在代码示例中还创建了两个对象, 以便为对象提供图像。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象将添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建控件:The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 此示例要求您已将代码添加到 , 并从构造函数或窗体上的其他方法调用在示例中创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and called the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求`MySmallImage1`名为`MyLargeImage1`、 `MySmallImage2`、和`MyLargeImage2`的映像位于驱动器 C 的根目录中。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. [!code-cpp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]
